title: How to Get a High Bounty in Need for Speed Most Wanted

steps.headline: Then drive to the bus station.
Drive on top of the buses.
Make sure the front end of your car is over the end of the buses so the cops can see you but can't get to you.
The cops will keep on ramming the buses and immobilize their cars.
Look behind you cops might climb onto the buses as well.
When your ready and got enough bounty jump off the buses.
Then smash through the petrol station.
Then get away!!
steps.description: and hide in the gas station

text: Get into a pursuit.  Drive to Rosewood.  Then drive to the bus station.  Drive on top of the buses.  Make sure the front end of your car is over the end of the buses so the cops can see you but can't get to you.  The cops will keep on ramming the buses and immobilize their cars.  Look behind you cops might climb onto the buses as well.  Reverse and push them off.  When your ready and got enough bounty jump off the buses.  Then smash through the petrol station.  Then get away!! and hide in the gas station
